hero.title: Coffi Project
hero.description: In a world where freedom to work from anywhere is becoming the norm, I built a platform that helps you find the perfect space to thrive.

mainContent.quote: Not just an app, but a reflection of how modern work should feel: intentional, flexible, and human.

genesis.title: From Simple Idea to Something Bigger
genesis.mainContent: What began as a simple idea—to help digital nomads find the best cafés to work or study—evolved into something much bigger: a real-time, purpose-driven social discovery platform for digital explorers.

need.title: The Need
need.description: As a remote creator moving from place to place, I craved more than coffee and Wi-Fi — I wanted spaces where I could truly focus, connect, and create.

response.title: The Response
response.description: Coffi became my answer — a platform that understands what creators and nomads truly need in their environments.

evolution.title: The Evolution
evolution.description: From finding cafés to discovering purpose-aligned environments of all kinds — the concept grew with each iteration.

genesis.pullQuote: Coffi isn't just about places, it's about finding your perfect moment in space.

vision.title: A Real-Time Guide for Purposeful Nomads
vision.description: Coffi is not just a workspace directory—it's a place-based social platform powered by community data and smart filtering. Whether you're trying to crush deep work, meet fellow nomads, or take a rejuvenating break, Coffi recommends the right environment in real-time.

devOps.title: DevOps
devOps.text: AWS Elastic Beanstalk, S3, CloudFront, CI/CD

differentiation.title: Product Differentiation
differentiation.mainContent: Each place on Coffi has static information and is augmented by live community updates—what we call a Session. Sessions are real-time ambient stories tied to a place, not a person.
differentiation.tagline: Think Instagram stories + Google Maps + Reddit = Coffi.

evolutionToEverywhere.title: From Coffees to Everywhere
evolutionToEverywhere.mainContent: Initially focused on cafés, we expanded to parks, lookouts, libraries, and more. Places are polymorphic, with unique attributes and filters depending on type.
evolutionToEverywhere.secondaryContent: Sessions adapt too—vibes in a rooftop vs. quietness in a library. This flexibility makes Coffi valuable across different contexts.

communityDrivenDesign.title: Community-Driven Design
communityDrivenDesign.subtitle: A space where moments and places converge to create something greater
communityDrivenDesign.mainContent: Coffi behaves like story-based social media, but for places. People share moments anonymously by location. There's no feed of people—only updates of vibes. This approach creates a unique atmosphere where the focus is on the quality of the space rather than who's posting.
communityDrivenDesign.secondaryContent: Each place becomes a canvas of real-time experiences, shaped collectively and enriched with every new visitor. It's inclusive, ambient, and purpose-driven.

placeFirst.title: Place-First
placeFirst.description: Unlike person-centered networks, Coffi prioritizes space over identity.

collectiveIntelligence.title: Collective Intelligence
collectiveIntelligence.description: Community insights create dynamic, real-time guides to each location.

ambientAwareness.title: Ambient Awareness
ambientAwareness.description: Real-time "vibes" help users find the perfect match for their current needs.

communityDrivenDesign.quote: In a world of personality-driven platforms, Coffi chooses to put the spotlight on places—letting the spaces speak for themselves.

freeLayer.title: Free Layer
freeLayer.description: Full database access + reviews and basic filtering

gamification.title: Gamification
gamification.description: Points for contributions, redeemable for benefits

longTermVision.title: Long-Term Vision
longTermVision.description: Coffi is set to evolve beyond a simple discovery tool into an ecosystem that supports digital nomads throughout their journey:
longTermVision.item1: Smart recommendation engine powered by AI
longTermVision.item3: Web3 layer for reward trust and verification
longTermVision.item4: Global nomad graph connecting people and places

concluding.description: I designed and built the entire platform—from frontend to backend, cloud infrastructure to real-time systems—because the world deserves better ways to connect with space and purpose.
